title: Bank of Canada Likely to Stand Pat This Week
text:
OTTAWA—Canada’s economy is showing enough resilience for the Bank of Canada to leave its key interest rate unchanged at a policy announcement on Wednesday, economists say, making Canada an outlier among advanced economies.

Economists from 10 out of 11 primary dealers of Canadian government securities told The Wall Street Journal they anticipate the Bank of Canada will keep its benchmark overnight interest rate at 1.75%, where it has sat for a year. About half of the economists surveyed expect the central bank will eventually...
